lines.text: God, I hate men... maybe I'll become a lesbian. On second thought, I hate women, too.
You're the nicest person I've ever met.
Do you really think I'll get to dance someday?
I should call your truant officer!
Is this what you came here for? You wanna see me naked?
You're just like the rest of em! You make me sick!
I take off my clothes for hundreds of men every night. Sometimes I even LIKE IT.
